short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AEM Extension to help AEM shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Short cut keys for AEM Authors, developers and Admins

1. Author Shortcut to sites, crxde, packages, dam, XFs, Tree activation
2. Admin Shortcut to Bundles, logs, Query builder, bundles, log analyser
3. Switching to edit, preview, disabled modes
4. Advanced links for admins - replication, bulkedit, jmx
